entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as saying 'No!' and expressing his opinion on the plan to get rid of You-Know-Who.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as being angry and wanting to be a part of the plan to help get rid of You-Know-Who.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is mentioned throughout the passage as reacting to various events.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as climbing through a hole in the wall and giving Harry a radiant smile.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as raising his hand to answer several cries of greeting and mentioning Aberforth's annoyance.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as asking Harry about the plan.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is mentioned as climbing through a hole in the wall with Ginny, Fred, and George.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is mentioned as being annoyed and wanting a kip.

entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is mentioned as smiling at Harry and holding up her fake Galleon.

entities.name: michael corner
entities.description: Michael Corner is mentioned as sitting beside Cho Chang.

relationships.description: Harry and Ginny are friends, as evidenced by Ginny's radiant smile when she sees Harry.
Fred is Aberforth's brother, as mentioned in the passage.
George is also Aberforth's brother, as mentioned in the passage.
Cho Chang is sitting beside Michael Corner, as mentioned in the passage.
